      • copyContentToTempFile

        public static File copyContentToTempFile(URL url)
        Creates a temporary file by copying the content of the original file given with the URL argument. The temporary file will be deleted on graceful JVM halt.

        May return with null if the file cannot be created.

        Parameters:
        url - the URL pointing to the original file to copy.
        Returns:
        the temporary copy file. Or null if the copy failed.
        See Also:
        File.deleteOnExit()

      • copyContentToTempFile

        public static File copyContentToTempFile(InputStream is,
                                         String fileName)
        Creates a temporary file by copying the content of the original file given as an input stream and the file name. The temporary file will be deleted on graceful JVM halt.

        May return with null if the file cannot be created.

        Callers are responsible for closing the input stream.

        Parameters:
        is - the input stream to the file.
        the - file name. Can be null. If null a random UUID will be assigned as the temporary file name.
        Returns:
        the temporary copy file. Or null if the copy failed.
        See Also:
        File.deleteOnExit()

      • getFileName

        public static final String getFileName(URL url)
        Returns with the file name (with the extension) extracted from the URL.
        May throw runtime exception if the URL is invalid or does not point to a file that has extension.
        Parameters:
        url - the URL pointing to a file.
        Returns:
        the name of the file.

        public static File createZipArchive(File rootDirectoryToZipUp,
                                    File archiveFile)
                             throws IOException
        Takes the root directory which contents must be zipped
        Parameters:
        rootDirectoryToZipUp - points to the root directory to zip up
        archiveFile - the zip file itself
        Returns:
        Throws:
        IOException

      • getZipEntries

        public static Collection<String> getZipEntries(File archive,
                                               boolean includeDirectories)
                                        throws IOException
        Returns the name of all ZipEntries in a zip archive. Inclusion of directories can be set by the includeDirectories parameter.
        Parameters:
        archive - - the zip file
        includeDirectories - - include directories or not
        Returns:
        A list of zip entry names
        Throws:
        IOException

      • decompressZipArchive

        public static void decompressZipArchive(File zipFile,
                                        File rootDirectoryToUnZip)
                                 throws IOException
        Takes a zip file and decompress it to the given root directory. If the directory where to put the contents of the zip file is not exist it creates it.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • showFile

        public static void showFile(File file)
        Attempts to show a File using the native operating system file view, for example the Finder on a Mac, or Explorer on Windows. This may not work on all platforms.
        Parameters:
        file - The file to be shown

      • search

        public static void search(File rootPath,
                          String fileName,
                          Set<File> occuranceCollectorSet)
        Collects the occurences into the passed Set (recursively)
